uvi.product_version: versions from v5.1 to before v5.12.13
uvi.description:
KVM: x86: Immediately reset the MMU context when the SMM flag is cleared

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.12.13 by commit df9a40cfb3be2cbeb1c17bb67c59251ba16630f3, it was introduced in version v5.1 by commit 9ec19493fb86d6d5fbf9286b94ff21e56ef66376. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: KVM: x86: Immediately reset the MMU context when the SMM flag is cleared
OSV.details:
